import { useState } from 'react' import CartContext from '../Store/Cart-Context' import classes from './Cart.module.css' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' let Cart = (props)=>{ let totalAmountCtx = (CartContext) let cartItems = [{id: 'c1' ,name: 'Sushi', amount: 2}].map((items) => items.name) let totalAmount = 0 let cartTotal = totalAmountCtx.totalAmount console.log(cartTotal,'cart total') return( <>
    {cartItems}
Total Amount: {cartTotal}
) } export default Cart
